lenders.name: TirzaTajunTarjaniTarini
lenders.whereabouts: Seaside and London, UK & Bergisch Gladbach, Germany
lenders.occupation: International Bestselling Author, Voice Over Artist
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way, to enable someone somewhere in the world to improve their living conditions, and I can re-invest the money once the loan is repaid. In this way, one sum can continually help people, rather than being a one-off. Also, it is nice to know that some people, who would be ashamed to receive donations as gifts, can keep their personal dignity intact by repaying the money once they have made an additional income with their loan and thus giving the money free to help somewhere else.  Great system!
lenders.occupational_info:
Tirza is the mother of three awesome children, a boy and two girls with whom she lives in Germany, a bestselling international author, poet and voice over artist. Besides writing spiritual books and poetry, she provides recorded speech in a wide variety of genres and industries. Clients include DJs, music producers and musicians from London to Berlin, USA to Hamburg. Tirza can also be booked together with Marilyn Holzmann for motivational and spiritual workshops, live poetry and literature readings. Her dedication and professionalism are inspiring and ensure all projects are completed within budget and on time. Her voice has a truly 'delicious' sound to it.

In addition to her freelance projects, Tirza is continuously working on her own books, as well as a few joint projects.

Tirza also writes erotic fiction for adults , the Tamera Shobhan Erotic Series. Writing an erotic poetry book is another pet project of hers.

You can book Tirza for a variety of recordings in spoken word, be it for music, audio books, guided meditations, video games, films, trainings videos for companies, live poetic and literary readings, etc.
Due to working in and with the English language, Tirza is often in the UK, but also available to work in other locations worldwide as required.

For further information, please visit her website: www.tirzaschaefer.com

lenders.name: William Logai
lenders.occupational_info:
Hope Ofiriha was founded by 12 widows in Lofiriha on July 27th, 1999. The charity is registered with Magwi County local government - Department of community services. 

Initially the charity assisted widows only, to identify and implement solutions to a variety of problems confronting them in the rural areas during the war. Local training and other projects promoting the conditions of widows were initiated. Since its inception, William Logai Ochieng and Linda Acen Abili re – started Hope ofiriha in 2006. They broaden its original purpose and begun to encompass projects beyond those narrowly aimed at widow’s training.The charity subsequently embarked to promote the issues affecting women, girls, and children as a whole in Lofiriha community, Magwi County, Sudan.
3 images places here

Ochieng and Abili have interest for Lofiriha people and in particular the area and the people around Omiling, where the charity is based. Ochieng brings a broad of commercial experience to Hope ofiriha, after having run his own business for several years and Abili has an administrative background from Juba University. Putting together their skills has meant that the charity has developed into anefficient, a fun and well organised organisation. They are realists, not idealists, and believing in giving a hand up, not a hand out!


They feel it is important that costs are kept to a minimum – for example, the design and maintenance of the website and all administrative work is done by them at no cost to the charity.

Hope ofiriha only employs local people, mostly women, and they are responsible for the day to day running of the projects. Ochieng and Abili are in daily contact with the senior managers, who provide progress reports on the projects. Ochieng regularly visits Lofiriha community to keep an eye on how the charity is running and to develop new programmes. They spend time training and empowering Hope ofiriha`s managers and staff, and meeting with members of the Lofiriha local community in most cases.

Hope ofiriha is different to most charities working in Sudan. So much money is spent on administration, monitoring, report writing, inefficient systems, etc., that very little money actually finds its way to the people who the donors wished to help. Hope ofiriha is based at Omiling and has minimal local overheads. The charity deals directly with the local communities, and it is made clear that Hope ofiriha helps people who help themselves. The charity often acts as a catalyst to make things happen.

Hope ofiriha has 425 local Lofiriha members who generously support the charity with their donations. 

Hope ofiriha is involved with education, micro –loans, child sponsorship, and healthcare locally to Lofiriha community. It is also actively involved in an environmental tree planting and reforestation project in Onura which covers an area of 2,000 Sq.km.

lenders.name: WholeKidsAdventure
lenders.loan_because: ...of the amazing success stories!!! I believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info:
Whole Kids Adventure, a Texas domestic non-profit corporation, was organized to provide a unique child development model that will focus on establishing healthy eating habits and increasing physical activity levels in preschool age children and their families in order to prevent the development of obesity and related health problems. We will provide health education for our WKA families and the general public!

Our priority is child obesity, an issue that influences most families in America. We are concerned about the growing obesity epidemic in children, and adolescents, a trend that will have social consequences throughout life.

We are currently establishing partnerships with organizations that support our WKA mission, and in addition we are working with local farms to set up a Food Co-Op to allow not only our children but also our families to enjoy fresh organic produce at an affordable rate directly from the farm!  

In addition to the Co-op, we are starting a Gardening program and will be setting up Community Garden(s) WITH and FOR our families. We are focused to GROW WITH and HELP EXPAND the LOCAL FOOD CULTURE!

Our first location will be non-toxic and environmentally friendly...

lenders.loan_because: I love that I can know of a specific person somewhere in the world who needs help.  Lending through Kiva, I can add my money to provide the funds to assist that  person achieve economic goals.

lenders.name: Rivven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world better.
lenders.occupational_info: It should be no surprise that I only lend in the food sector!

lenders.name: lorene
lenders.loan_because: I need to do something to help alleviate poverty worldwide

lenders.name: Jackdaddy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much.. i want to bless others

lenders.name: Aaron Wolf
lenders.loan_because: Lack of access to capital is a major roadblock to development.
lenders.occupational_info: I study.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to - I hope you are too.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a meaningful way to spread resources around.

lenders.name: Moo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small act can make impact on somebody life.
lenders.occupational_info: When I was young, somebody has always helped me to be able to get educated and opportunity to play golf. Now, I'm able to play on the golf tour and living the dream I'm chasing for, therefore, I want to give it back to the community. I thank God for his blissing.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of micro-loaning because they not only help the people but they motivate them.  Even better my money can be reused many times for many different people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sailor in the united states navy.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I work to better our air quality, Carole works at a college helping students improve their writing, and finding their way through the college system.

lenders.name: T. J.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people look and feel their best naturally.

lenders.name: Romina
lenders.loan_because: my academic schooling has taught me about our world and its surrounding problems on a more intimate level which has interested me. I would like to help in any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time high school student in a special program known as the International Baccalaureate. I want to dedicate my personal time and effort towards the integration of cultures thousands of miles apart.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: my daughter inspired me.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean a hospital

lenders.name: will
lenders.loan_because: The money will be put to better use this way. The money helps a community to help themselves up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help anyone that comes to my desk as best I can.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: Its nice knowing that you are giving someone a chance to make there own business work.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and I learn something knew everyday.

lenders.name: Erica

lenders.occupational_info: http://naturevisionstoo.etsy.com

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can help people across the world make their lives a little better.  This makes the world a little better.  I now live in a better world.  Any questions?
lenders.occupational_info: I buy musical supplies from a distributor and sell them on eBay.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization which connects people of all races and backgrounds in a common cause to make lives better.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: it helps and I admire hard workers.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people and businesses who are raising the consciousness of the planet.

Jay works a 9-5 job in Information Technology.
David is a teacher.

lenders.occupational_info: My day job is working in customer service, assisting people with questions they have about the company I work for. But what I really enjoy is writing stories and novels and sharing them.

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: It's a small world.
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a university in Montreal, Canada. My specialty is animation and creative writing such as poetry and short stories.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: from studying the "trade vs. aid" issue while teaching students debate, realized that direct loans are an empowering way to help create opportunities for economic growth in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make music videos, commercials, and short films, and recently graduated from film school.  To pay the bills, I teach English, Math, and Debate at an after school learning center for children 8-18.

lenders.occupational_info: mother of three girls

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: people have helped me in the past.  It's my turn.  Someday, hopefully the people that may be helped by my loans can help someone else.  Nobody gets by alone in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach vocal music to children ages 11 to 15.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way inspire entrepreneurs who otherwise might not be able to achieve their dreams.  It's a neighborly helping hand, sometimes reaching out from around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on software for people to do their banking on the Internet.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.occupational_info: I m working in the sales department of an american toy and game company in Germany and take care of some of the important customers of the German branch (like department stores, hypermarkets and specialised toy shops)

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with information technology

lenders.name: Jimena
lenders.loan_because: I like having the opportunity to help other people. Besides Kiva gives me the chance to show my little sister Alejandra that there is an active way to help our community

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Knowing the difficulty in obtaining bank loans, never mind attracting investors, I know how difficult it is to start, maintain and expand a business in U.S., never mind in third world nations.  Helping others with raising funds is more rewarding as it allows me to help more people as a group then individually.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help small start up businesses with FundRaiser 1.0 which enables everyone to raise the funds they need for their needs without the worry or concern to repay loans or interest expenses.  

This is the perfect system for anyone in the world who wants to raise funds for their business, non profit charity or for personal needs. With cost of setting up Fundraiser 1.0 Software only $4.99 U.S., it is within reach of everyone who needs funding.  www.Cash-Fundraiser.com

lenders.name: david
lenders.occupation: former government worker, not have own small busin

lenders.name: Simona
lenders.loan_because: I find it a congenial way to help people construct a better future for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can...and I hope to make the world a smaller place...I want to support girls and women of the world
lenders.occupational_info: Office work - answer phones, book appointments, bank, invoice.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: we want to give back...again and again...for all of the blessings of our lives in family and friends.  We want to connect with people in other lands knowing that we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired but doing volunteer work near to where we live

lenders.name: jenni
lenders.loan_because:
i haven't always been fortunate enough to have the resources to share with others. i think it's important to do so when you can. 

i'd like to own my own business someday, but for now i'll help others start theirs!
lenders.occupational_info: i write websites for community education programs.

lenders.name: Parth
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org empowers those in poverty with a financial opportunity that often transforms entrepreneur's lives and usually transcends into a positive social impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Co-Founder and National Director of Kiva High School, a national network of high school students, and their respective chapters, unified by a belief that poverty can be alleviated and that microfinance is an effective tool to achieve this end.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone could use a little help sometimes.

lenders.name: ILONA
lenders.loan_because: Rich is who owns a lot, richer who does not need much and richest who gives a lot!

lenders.occupational_info: I am working as secretary at the local university.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I like to share.

lenders.name: Dave & Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: To give to the KIVA community makes my heart happy.
lenders.occupational_info: My company and team provides virtual support to executives, professionals, and corporations with administrative, business development, and writing assistance. An alternative method of providing services with cost-effective solutions. In addition, we don't clog up highways and create more pollution or waste precious fuel, and we are able to spend more time with our families instead of spending it in traffic.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected.  Helping others helps all of us to live in a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with adults who have lost their ability to speak.

lenders.name: Quinn & Will
lenders.loan_because: No matter how much life splits from the source, everything tends to gravitate back towards it.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I feel that an individuals small business is more to them than just a  machine to derive income.  The roots of  individuals and families who own small businesses around the world is a reflection of decades of  history, culture, and craftsmanship that will go into his or hers future project.  I support anyone who dreams about owning his or her own business, because everyone deserves to be in the drivers seat.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the creative director and also a partner in Image Creative Organization, an advertising and organizational identity firm in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.  Our group develops a wide variety of marketing communication material from concept to creation.

lenders.name: Bernardine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: it's a small world and we are all responsible for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a theatre in Switzerland, and although I am bound to my (german) language, I work with a lot of people from all over the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I help to educate others about daily rituals that will them to obtain improved  well being and beauty  in an eco-conscious manner. I provide a place for people to receive spa calming treatments.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I think that people who are willing to work hard deserve the chance to succeed in life. Plus, I've always wanted to be an international financier.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a government attorney. A big part of my job is helping business owners with their tax questions.

i am 14 years old and I live in poor city what called tbilisi,my dream is to became a famous bascetball star,I am vhery tall and have vhery good skills,but whe have vhery big family i have 3 sisters,and whe dont have money for my trainings,to became a star you need to train every day,if you help me with this problem i be vhery happy,and i can train my skills,please help how you can.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make Ukrainians' orphans' life better at their own home.
lenders.occupational_info: Orphans' Future Foundation Provides special care for Ukrainian 290 orphans ages 3-21 in small Ternopil region.

lenders.name: GFWC-Gun Lake Book Club
lenders.loan_because: Our book club read BANKER TO THE POOR by Muhammad Yunus.  We were inspired to put a microloan together in response.
lenders.occupational_info: Our book club members are housewives, former teachers, a minister's wife, mothers, etc.  We all volunteer in some capacity.

lenders.name: Gautam
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in India and know from first hand experience how much difference one Dollar can make in a developing country. I think the concept of micro financing is brilliant. Its amazing how the money I spend to buy a week's groceries can help someone in a developing country start a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day trying to build meaningful reports from data collected over many years. These reports are meant to help the management of an organization in tracking status of activities, support its decision making process.

lenders.name: erica
lenders.loan_because: I want to be helpful.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell chemicals made of natural items like citrus oil and soy which are safe for the user and the environment

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people; both as individuals and as communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with the private sector, non-profits, governmental agencies, and indian tribes to improve efficiency, the environment, and their bottom line.
